description.narrative: To guarantee the rights of children and adolescents according to the standards of the General Law on the Rights of Children and Adolescents, UNICEF continued supporting the Mexican government in its role as an EVAC pathfinder country through SIPINNA's Inter-institutional Commission on Violence, which approved a new national action plan. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/01/2020
